contentList.content: When you miss an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you may use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to deal [1] regardless.

When you miss an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you may use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to deal [1] regardless. This damage scales with your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> modifier.
This weapon heavily damages enemy armor on hits, reducing the target's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1] until their next turn.
This weapon easily defeats armor. Melee attacks ignore piercing <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> and have a bonus of [1] to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
This weapon causes extreme internal damage on a good hit. Increases the damage of <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> by [1].
You wrap the flail around your target's weapon, dealing [1] and attempting to disarm them unless they succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
<LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced by [1] until next turn
Attacks made by this weapon deal extra [1] to targets in metal armor.

You may use your <LSTag Tooltip="Reaction">Reaction</LSTag> to parry an incoming melee attack to reduce its damage by [1]+[2]. This effect has a cooldown of [3] turns and scales with double your proficiency bonus.

After attacking roll a <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> [1] <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>, on success raise your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [2] for [3] turns.

This weapon's edge is sharp enough to cut your very soul. On <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>, applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AO_HEAVY_BLEEDING">Heavy Bleeding</LSTag> to target for [1] turns.

This weapon is covered in spikes that tear foes apart. On <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>, applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="AO_HEAVY_BLEEDING">Heavy Bleeding</LSTag> to target for [1] turns.

Creature is bleeding profusely, taking an additional [1] at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws.

Removed by healing.
Pikes are especially long weapons, boasting the furthest reach of all melee weapons. Useful for supporting allies from relative safety.

This bow has an especially heavy draw weight. Both your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> are important to be effective with this weapon. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and Damage rolls receive a [1] bonus, which can hurt or help you depending on your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> benefit is capped at [2]. Damage bonus is uncapped.
You draw the bow way further than normal for a mighty shot that hits with extreme force, at the cost of accuracy. Take a [1] penalty to your attack roll, deal an extra [2].
Crossbows utilize a buttstock and trigger assembly, making them far easier to aim accurately than bows. You have [1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with this weapon.

You calm yourself and take careful time with your shot. Spend [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and reduce the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> threshold on the next ranged attack by [2]. This effect can stack with stack.

You take multiple arrows in your hand and take a steady stance, preparing an onslaught for your foes. Spend [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> to shoot [2] different targets at once, at reduced damage.
Shortbows are light and handy, perfect for hit-and-run tactics. Landing a hit with this weapon gives you extra [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> this turn.
[1] penalty to your ranged attack roll, deal an extra [2].
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and reduced the <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> threshold of the next ranged attack by [1].
